short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically gives kudos to all posts on strava dashboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your Strava experience with the Strava Kudos Clicker Extension! This handy tool simplifies the process of appreciating your friends' activities by automatically clicking all "Give Kudos" buttons on your Strava dashboard. Save time and make sure no great effort goes unnoticed!

Features:

- Effortless Appreciation: Ensure all your friends and fellow athletes get the recognition they deserve without having to manually click through each activity.
- Time Saver: Perfect for those with a busy schedule who still want to stay engaged with their Strava community.
- Easy to Use: Simple interface with intuitive controls. Just install and let the extension do the rest.

How to Use:

1. Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Open your Strava dashboard.
3. The extension will automatically click all "Give Kudos" buttons for you.

Stay connected with your Strava community effortlessly. Download the Strava Kudos Clicker Extension today and start spreading the love with ease!
